title: OCE Missing Ward Skin
body: I got the lantern of the serpent ward skin from hextech a while ago and have been using it ever since, but since I updated the client to the recent patch it has disappeared. I really want it back can you please look into this

replies.body:
Hey! 

There is currently a bug preventing you from seeing certain ward skins. Don't worry - you still own them! 

In the meantime, we're looking into what's causing this.
